title: Micah, The Fierce Dominates Emma, The Brave
description: Micah and Emma can’t get enough of each other. He is overcome by Emma’s sensuality and compassion. She is turned on by his raw masculinity and soulfulness. In part 3, they up the stakes and play a wicked game of surrendering control. Packed with raw emotion and passionate sex, this sizzling series takes our adventurous couple deep into virgin territory. Can they keep up their impassioned pace?
author: Jessa Eden
